title: The Magnum Model
description: I was hired to paint a nude portrait, but my boss has specific tastes.She wants a certain kind of model.A magnum model if you know what I mean.When Cole Hunt walks into my studio and drops his robe...I realize I'm going to need a bigger canvas.And more paint.With those dark possessive eyes staring at me for the next couple of weeks,I'm going to need all the professionalism I can muster.Because my magnum model looks like he has more on his mind then just standing there politely...  How many strokes will it take for this work of art? Mila will have both her hands full with this well-endowed possessive alpha. All it takes is one look for this over-the-top alpha to become obsessed!Insta-love at its finest in a SAFE read with no cheating and a super sweet HEA guaranteed. Double V-cards. Enjoy!
author: Olivia T. Turner
